titleInfo.title: Barbour Lewis in Memphis, TN to Gen. John Eaton in Nashville, TN

subject.geographic: Tennessee -- Officials and employees -- selection and appointment.

mods.note: Long discussion of a political victory over Tomeny, Beaumont, and their friends and of a coming election in which he is hopeful that Davis will win out over Chandler. Hopes that Eaton will come to Memphis and allow his brother a vacation. Reports that the Post has a growing number of supporters, including Hunter, Beecher, and Waldron and Fitch and his friends.
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.

titleInfo.title: Digital Collection: The Growth of Democracy in Tennessee: A Grassroots Approach to Volunteer Voices
